Home Libraries People FAQ More

async_read_until

Start an asynchronous operation to read data into a streambuf until it contains a delimiter, matches a regular expression, or a function object indicates a match. 

template<
    typename AsyncReadStream,
    typename Allocator,
    typename ReadHandler>
void-or-deduced async_read_until(
    AsyncReadStream & s,
    boost::asio::basic_streambuf< Allocator > & b,
    char delim,
    ReadHandler handler);
  » more...

template<
    typename AsyncReadStream,
    typename Allocator,
    typename ReadHandler>
void-or-deduced async_read_until(
    AsyncReadStream & s,
    boost::asio::basic_streambuf< Allocator > & b,
    const std::string & delim,
    ReadHandler handler);
  » more...

    typename AsyncReadStream,
    typename Allocator,
    typename ReadHandler>
void-or-deduced async_read_until(
    AsyncReadStream & s,
    boost::asio::basic_streambuf< Allocator > & b,
    const boost::regex & expr,
    ReadHandler handler);
  » more...

template<
    typename AsyncReadStream,
    typename Allocator,
    typename MatchCondition,
    typename ReadHandler>
void-or-deduced async_read_until(
    AsyncReadStream & s,
    boost::asio::basic_streambuf< Allocator > & b,
    MatchCondition match_condition,
    ReadHandler handler,
    typename enable_if< is_match_condition< MatchCondition >::value >::type *  = 0);
  » more...
Requirements

Header: boost/asio/read_until.hpp

Convenience header: boost/asio.hpp
